message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_NEGATIVE_COST
message.locale: The estimated Cost Cannot be negative.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_FV_STARTDATE_PROVLOCATION
message.locale: The provision location start date must not be before the provider location start date.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_FV_ENDDATE_PRODPROVISION
message.locale: The provision location end date must not be later than the product provision end date.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_FV_ENDDATE_PROVLOCATION
message.locale: The provision location end date must not be later than the provider location end date.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_FV_STARTDATE_PRODPROVISION
message.locale: The provision location start date must not be before the product provision start date.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_FV_LOCATION_EMPTY
message.locale: The location field must not be empty.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_FV_NO_ENDDATE_STARTDATE_PROVLOCATION
message.locale: The provision location start date must not be after the provider location end date.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_FV_NO_ENDDATE_STARTDATE_PRODPROVISION
message.locale: The provision location start date must not be after the product provision end date.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_XRV_ENDDATE_NOT_MATCH_EARLIEST
message.locale: The provision location end date is not the same as the earliest of the Provider Location or Product Provision end date.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_FV_NO_VALID_LOCATION
message.locale: The location selected is not available for this product provision. Please select another location.
